wikipedia_page.main: Frank Taylor (1887 – January 1928) was an English footballer who scored 10 goals from 36 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City. He played as an outside left or at centre forward. He went on to play non-league football for Worksop Town and in the Southern League for Merthyr Town.
